partial_progress.details: Session 25: Established structural solution for G/H cases. Created helper lemmas for single-time invariant (initial_timeIndices_eq, no_future_times_of_single_time, no_past_times_of_single_time, addFormula_preserves_single_time, addToAllFamilies_preserves_single_time). These need Mathlib 4 API fixing. G/H cases structured with h_no_future/h_no_past lemmas but blocked on adding h_single_time to main theorem.
next_steps: Fix API issues in no_future_times_of_single_time and no_past_times_of_single_time
Thread h_single_time through all IH calls
Update seedConsistent theorem to pass initial_timeIndices_eq
